meeting_info.location: City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas; Videoconference

presenters: Lawrence Agu, III, AICP, Assoc AIA

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of Minutes of the May 2, 2024 City Plan Commission Hearing, May 9, 2024 Special Called City Plan Commission ForwardDallas Meeting, May 16, 2024 City Plan Commission Hearing, and the June 6, 2024 City Plan Commission Hearing.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application for a Specific Use Permit for a multiple-family use on property zoned an I-2 Industrial Subdistrict within Planned Development District No. 193.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application for an amendment to Tract 6A within Planned Development District No. 170.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application for an amendment to Planned Development District No. 1098.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application for a Specific Use Permit for a body piercing studio and a tattoo studio.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application for a Specific Use Permit for a bar, lounge, or tavern.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application for a Specific Use Permit for an alcoholic beverage establishment.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case - Under Advisement
agenda_items.description: An application for a Specific Use Permit for an electrical substation.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case - Individual
agenda_items.description: An application for a Planned Development District for MU-2 Mixed Use District uses.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case - Individual
agenda_items.description: An application for a Planned Development District for specific residential and nonresidential uses.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case - Individual
agenda_items.description: An application for a new subdistrict for SC Shopping Center District uses.

agenda_items.title: Special Provision Sign District
agenda_items.description: An application to create a new subdistrict, MKT Subdistrict, within the West End Historic Sign District.

agenda_items.title: Subdivision Case - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application to create 14 residential lots from a 4.618-acre tract of land.

agenda_items.title: Subdivision Case - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application to create one 0.344-acre lot from a tract of land.

agenda_items.title: Subdivision Case - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application to create one 0.602-acre lot and one 1.747-acre lot.

agenda_items.title: Street Name Change
agenda_items.description: An application to change S. Central Expressway to 'S.M. Wright Freeway'.
